comments.body:
Not a huge fan of using stderr for informational messages, but I know this is the [same way `label --list` does it](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/908847c01e9640ffce2ffda5acf88d92c48a5148/staging/src/k8s.io/kubectl/pkg/cmd/label/label.go#L365).

I'll leave this up to @soltysh to comment on, but since it is done the same way in `label --list`, I'm fine with either leaving it this way, or fixing it in both places.
Brian is reading my mind - please change it to `StdOut` especially that's expected, can be done in a followup.
I'd drop this variable since it's used only once and `info.ResourceMapping().GroupVersionKind`

Oh this was moved from L306 and the `mapping` is used later for the RESTClient and Helper

https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/87714/files#diff-096bdc74849ae7e7382de6d59b2578cfL306
